Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>

Entry.JapaneseText: ミリッツァ
Entry.EnglishText: Militsa

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: 男の人の声
Entry.EnglishText: Man's Voice

Entry.JapaneseText: 女の人の声
Entry.EnglishText: Woman's Voice

Entry.JapaneseText: 男の人
Entry.EnglishText: Man

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギア兵
Entry.EnglishText: Callegean Soldier

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>

Entry.JapaneseText: シャオルーン
Entry.EnglishText: Shaorune

Entry.JapaneseText: クレア
Entry.EnglishText: Claire

Entry.JapaneseText: 男の子
Entry.EnglishText: Boy

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: サニイタウン南門
Entry.EnglishText: Sunnytown - South Entrance

Entry.JapaneseText: サニイタウン南門
Entry.EnglishText: Sunnytown - South Entrance

Entry.JapaneseText: サニイタウン南門
Entry.EnglishText: Sunnytown - South Entrance

Entry.JapaneseText: ネコ好きの じいさんの家
Entry.EnglishText: Cat Lover's House

Entry.JapaneseText: ネコ好きの じいさんの家
Entry.EnglishText: Cat Lover's House

Entry.JapaneseText: 民家
Entry.EnglishText: Residence

Entry.JapaneseText: 民家
Entry.EnglishText: Residence

Entry.JapaneseText: 広場への道
Entry.EnglishText: Town Square

Entry.JapaneseText: くそっ…… どこ行っちまったんだ、あの娘は！
Entry.EnglishText: Dammit... Where'd that girl go?!

Entry.JapaneseText: ミリッツァより先に、 さっきの女の人を見つけないと!!
Entry.EnglishText: We have to find her before Militsa does!

Entry.JapaneseText: 遅い。
Entry.EnglishText: Too late.

Entry.JapaneseText: きゃっ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Eeeek!

Entry.JapaneseText: 大丈夫か、<Annie>！
Entry.EnglishText: Are you okay, <Annie>?!

Entry.JapaneseText: このくらい、 何でもありません！
Entry.EnglishText: I'm fine, it's nothing!

Entry.JapaneseText: しかし……
Entry.EnglishText: But...

Entry.JapaneseText: おとなしく 寝ていればいいものを。
Entry.EnglishText: Be a good little girl and stay down next time.

Entry.JapaneseText: また来るぞ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Here she comes!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……本体は倒せなかったか!?
Entry.EnglishText: ...Did we miss her real body?!

Entry.JapaneseText: 邪魔をするな。 おまえたちに私は倒せない。
Entry.EnglishText: Don't interfere. I won't lose to the likes of you.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……どうすりゃいいんだ。 <Yellow>虹のフォルス<White>って何なんだよ。
Entry.EnglishText: ...What should we do? What the heck is this <Yellow>Force of Rainbow<White>, anyway?

Entry.JapaneseText: 幻を見せる能力？
Entry.EnglishText: Maybe it's the ability to create illusions?

Entry.JapaneseText: あれは、幻なんかじゃ なかったぜ。
Entry.EnglishText: Funny, those didn't feel like illusions to me!

Entry.JapaneseText: 分身する能力なのか？
Entry.EnglishText: Is it the ability to clone oneself?

Entry.JapaneseText: このままじゃ、ヤバイぜ……
Entry.EnglishText: At this rate, we're goners...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>虹<White>……もしかして光？ 光かもしれません。
Entry.EnglishText: "<Yellow>Rainbow<White>"... Something to do with light, perhaps?

Entry.JapaneseText: 光？
Entry.EnglishText: Light?

Entry.JapaneseText: ミリッツァの<Yellow>虹のフォルス<White>は、 光を操って、幻のようなものを見せる 能力なんじゃないでしょうか？
Entry.EnglishText: Militsa may be using optical illusions to create apparitions of herself using her <Yellow>Force of Rainbow<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: どういう事だよ!?
Entry.EnglishText: In layman's terms?

Entry.JapaneseText: おそらくミリッツァは、 フォルスの塊に光を重ねて、 それを自分の分身のように 操っているんだと思います。
Entry.EnglishText: I think Militsa is creating replicas of herself by molding the light surrounding pieces of her Force into her own image.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>の仮説が正しければ、 あの分身は幻に過ぎない。 いくら倒しても意味がない。
Entry.EnglishText: If <Annie>'s theory is correct, these clones are nothing but mirages. There's no sense in attacking them.

Entry.JapaneseText: ミリッツァの本体を見つけて 直接叩かない限り、 奴を倒す事はできない。
Entry.EnglishText: We won't be able to defeat Militsa unless we're able to attack her real body.

Entry.JapaneseText: だけど、あれだけ完璧な分身じゃ、 見分けるなんてできっこないよ。 フォルス反応も全員にあるし……
Entry.EnglishText: But we can't tell them apart because they're perfect copies. Even their Force signatures are identical...

Entry.JapaneseText: できるわ。
Entry.EnglishText: It's doable.

Entry.JapaneseText: ホント!?
Entry.EnglishText: Really!?

Entry.JapaneseText: 光で幻を見せている <Yellow>虹のフォルス<White>攻略のカギは、 やはり……光。
Entry.EnglishText: The <Yellow>Force of Rainbow<White> manipulates light to create illusions, so the key to making them fall apart must also be light.

Entry.JapaneseText: 幻が光によって作られているなら、 周囲の光を妨げれば、幻は消えます！
Entry.EnglishText: If we interfere with the ambient lighting that she's using to make them, the illusions will be no more!

Entry.JapaneseText: つまり分身が消えて 本体だけが残るってコトだネ！
Entry.EnglishText: In other words, the clones will vanish and only her true body will remain!

Entry.JapaneseText: なるほど…… ミリッツァの分身を消すためには、 光を遮る方法を考えればいいわけだな。
Entry.EnglishText: All right... We need to think of something that will disrupt the light and snuff out Militsa's clones.

Entry.JapaneseText: 蒸気はどうだ？ オレの氷と、<Mao>の炎……
Entry.EnglishText: How about steam? With my ice and <Mao>'s fire...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……やってみる価値は ありそうだな。
Entry.EnglishText: ...It's worth a try.

Entry.JapaneseText: うわぁぁっ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Aaaaah!

Entry.JapaneseText: やめてーっ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Stop it!

Entry.JapaneseText: あいつ……街中を巻き込んででも さっきの女の子を探すつもりだぜ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Dammit... Is she planning on destroying the whole city just to find that girl!?

Entry.JapaneseText: ヤツを止めなければ!!
Entry.EnglishText: We have to stop her!

Entry.JapaneseText: うん！ 行こう！
Entry.EnglishText: Right! Let's go!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>、ナニやってんだ？ 置いてっちまうぜ。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>, what're you doing? You're gonna get left behind.

Entry.JapaneseText: すまん、すぐに行く。
Entry.EnglishText: My bad. I'm coming.

Entry.JapaneseText: いつもと変わらないみたいだけど…… ホントにここが<Blue>幻の島<White>なのか？
Entry.EnglishText: Nothing seems out of the ordinary here. Are we sure that this is the <Blue>Island of Illusions<White>?

Entry.JapaneseText: オレたちの考えが正しければ、 きっと何かが見つかるはずだ。
Entry.EnglishText: If we're on the right track, then we're sure to find something.

Entry.JapaneseText: どういう事なんだ!! なぜ、我々ヒューマだけが 軍の監視を受けなきゃならない!!
Entry.EnglishText: What is the meaning of this? Why are us Huma the only ones being put under military surveillance?!

Entry.JapaneseText: 貴様らヒューマによる ガジュマへの差別や攻撃が カレギアの秩序を乱している。
Entry.EnglishText: It's because you Huma are disrupting the order of Callegea by discriminating against and committing acts of violence against Gajuma.

Entry.JapaneseText: よって、治安が回復するまで、 ヒューマを監視せよという命令が 下ったのだ！
Entry.EnglishText: Consequently, we've been given directions to have Huma placed under surveillance until peace and order has been restored!

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマどもは自分勝手だからな！ 誰かに見張られているぐらいが ちょうどいいんだよ！
Entry.EnglishText: You guys brought this on yourselves! Being put under someone's watchful eye is your just deserts!

Entry.JapaneseText: なんだと、ガジュマのくせに！ 調子に乗るなっ！
Entry.EnglishText: You have some nerve for a Gajuma! You'd better watch yourself!

Entry.JapaneseText: 今のような差別発言を 繰り返すようならば、 拘禁、抑留もあり得るぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: If you keep making such discriminatory remarks, you might find yourself facing arrest or imprisonment.

Entry.JapaneseText: 自分たちがガジュマだからって 連中だけかばうなんて差別だ!!
Entry.EnglishText: You're discriminating against us by only protecting your fellow Gajuma!

Entry.JapaneseText: 差別する兵隊なんていらねえよっ!! すぐに帰れっ!!
Entry.EnglishText: We don't need prejudiced soldiers like you! Get lost!

Entry.JapaneseText: そうだ、帰れー！ この街から出ていけー！
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah, leave! Get the hell out of this town!

Entry.JapaneseText: 帰れ帰れ！
Entry.EnglishText: Go home! Go home!!

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえらこそ、 この街から出てけっ!!
Entry.EnglishText: You're the ones who need to leave this town!

Entry.JapaneseText: 出てけっ！ 出てけっ！
Entry.EnglishText: Beat it! Scram!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……これ以上、 混乱が大きくなっては、面倒だ！ ヒューマどもを全員、引っ捕えろ！
Entry.EnglishText: ...There's going to be trouble if we let this commotion get any worse! Arrest all the Huma!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ど、どうなってるんだ？ 思念は消えたんじゃないのかよ？ なあ、<Eugene>!?
Entry.EnglishText: ...Wh-What's going on? His <Blue>Will<White> should be gone, shouldn't it? Right, <Eugene>?!

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、消えているはずだ。 少なくとも、俺には もう思念の影響はない。
Entry.EnglishText: Yes, it should be. I'm no longer under its influence, at the very least.

Entry.JapaneseText: じゃあ、さっきの人たちは どうして……
Entry.EnglishText: Then why were they fighting just now...?

Entry.JapaneseText: 争いは何も思念のせいだけでは なかったのかもしれんな……
Entry.EnglishText: Maybe his <Blue>Will<White> was not the only thing behind all this...

Entry.JapaneseText: だとしたら……まさか、 この街以外でも……？
Entry.EnglishText: If that's true, then... Could it be like this in other towns as well?

Entry.JapaneseText: それはわからない。 だが、あり得ない話ではない。
Entry.EnglishText: I'm unsure, but it's not impossible.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……これじゃあ、 種族の共存なんて……
Entry.EnglishText: How can coexistence between the races be possible when things are like this...?

Entry.JapaneseText: 何だよ……おれたちは どうすりゃいいんだよ！
Entry.EnglishText: Damn... What are we supposed to do now?!

Entry.JapaneseText: シャオルーン!?
Entry.EnglishText: Shaorune!

Entry.JapaneseText: あれっ、どうしたの!?
Entry.EnglishText: Huh? What's up?

Entry.JapaneseText: 世界中で、ガジュマとヒューマが 戦いを始めようとしてるんだ！
Entry.EnglishText: Fights are about to break out between Gajuma and Huma all over the world!

Entry.JapaneseText: 他でも同じような事が!? 思念は浄化されたんじゃないのか!?
Entry.EnglishText: It's the same elsewhere?! But didn't we purge the <Blue>Will<White>?!

Entry.JapaneseText: とにかく、ぼくと一緒に行こう！ 街の外で待ってるよ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Just come with me! I'll be waiting outside the city!

Entry.JapaneseText: みんな、行きましょう！
Entry.EnglishText: Let's go, everyone!

Entry.JapaneseText: このあいだ、軍の船が 仲間の兵士たちを乗せて、 ミナールに向かったんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Recently, my comrades boarded a military ship headed towards Minal.

Entry.JapaneseText: バルカからも軍船が出たと聞くが、 一体ミナールで何があったんだろうな。
Entry.EnglishText: I heard a ship departed from Balka too. What on earth is happening in Minal?

Entry.JapaneseText: まったく、ここんところ 落ち着かないな……
Entry.EnglishText: Sheesh, this place is always on edge...

Entry.JapaneseText: 前みたいにのんびりと 暮らしたいよ、まったく。
Entry.EnglishText: I just want everything to be peaceful like before...

Entry.JapaneseText: おとなしくできないガジュマも 家の中に入ってるこったな。
Entry.EnglishText: Gajuma who cannot maintain the peace will also be asked to remain indoors.

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマは部屋に入ってな。 モメごと起こしたくないだろ？
Entry.EnglishText: Huma need to go inside. I take it you don't want to cause trouble, right?

Entry.JapaneseText: ミナールでは 種族間の衝突が絶えず、 危険な状況だ。
Entry.EnglishText: The interracial strife in Minal is never-ending, and the situation there grows more dangerous by the day.

Entry.JapaneseText: しばらくミナール方面へは 行かないようにするんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: I'd advise you to avoid the Minal region at the moment.

Entry.JapaneseText: 謎の地鳴りについては、 軍を挙げて調査中だ。 自宅で発表を待つように。
Entry.EnglishText: The military is investigating the source of this rumbling. Please wait for any announcement at home.

Entry.JapaneseText: 現在、この街は特別警戒中だ。 騒ぎの原因となった者を 現在、捜索中だ。
Entry.EnglishText: This town is currently under special alert. We are searching for the individuals behind this conflict.

Entry.JapaneseText: 現在、この街は特別警戒中だ。 ヒューマの外出は 控えてもらいたい。
Entry.EnglishText: This town is currently under special alert. We advise you Huma to refrain from stepping outside.

Entry.JapaneseText: 定期船に乗りに来たのかい？ 乗り場は街の東にあるよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Are you here to board a ship? If so, just head east and you'll find the port.

Entry.JapaneseText: そこの出口から出て 西に向かう道が テルアラ街道だね。
Entry.EnglishText: If you head out of that entrance over there, you'll find yourself on the Tel'alla Highway.

Entry.JapaneseText: おや、病人かい？ そりゃ、大変だ。
Entry.EnglishText: One of your friends is ill? That's not good.
Entry.Notes: tried running it through deepl and this is what I decided to go with.

Entry.JapaneseText: すぐに、宿屋で 休ませてあげなきゃね！
Entry.EnglishText: Take her to the inn so she can get some rest.

Entry.JapaneseText: 人を探しているのかい？ 家の中とか、物かげとか、 よく探してみたかい？
Entry.EnglishText: You're searching for someone? Have you checked inside houses or other hiding spots?

Entry.JapaneseText: 思わぬところに 隠れ場所ってのは あるからねえ……
Entry.EnglishText: You might just find her where you'd least expect...

Entry.JapaneseText: なんか、みんな広場に行くって 言ってたけど、何かあるのかな？
Entry.EnglishText: Everyone said that they're heading to the town square for some reason. I wonder what's happening?

Entry.JapaneseText: 水やりが終わったら 行ってみよう……
Entry.EnglishText: I should check it out once I've finished watering these plants.

Entry.JapaneseText: 女王様の即位の儀式か…… 人が大勢集まるんだろうね。
Entry.EnglishText: I wonder if a large crowd is going to show up for the Queen's inauguration ceremony.

Entry.JapaneseText: サニイタウンでもやってくれると この街も繁盛して、助かるんだけど。 ま、無理か？
Entry.EnglishText: If we could get that many people here in Sunnytown, this town would prosper. ...But I don't think that'll happen.

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマが通ると、 羽やら毛やらで、 道路が汚れるんだよな。
Entry.EnglishText: Gajuma litter the road with their fur and feathers when they pass through here.

Entry.JapaneseText: こっちも掃除が大変だよ！ ああ、水まかなきゃ！
Entry.EnglishText: They make cleaning the road such a hassle, and I have to water, too!

Entry.JapaneseText: 前は気にもしなかったけど、 ヒューマとガジュマが同じ<Yellow>ヒト<White>、 だなんて思えないよな？
Entry.EnglishText: I didn't care about this before, but I just can't see Gajuma as my fellow <Yellow>Man<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: だって、そうだろ？ イヌとネコを同じだなんて、 言うヤツはいないもんな？
Entry.EnglishText: ...But doesn't that make sense? No one in this world would say that dogs and cats are the same.

Entry.JapaneseText: 毎日、手入れしてやらないと、 潮風にさらされて 枯れてしまうのさ。
Entry.EnglishText: If I don't tend to these plants daily, then they'll wither due to the sea breeze.

Entry.JapaneseText: 港なら、そこの階段を降りて、 道なりに行けばわかるよ。
Entry.EnglishText: If you head down those stairs and follow the road ahead, you can reach the port.

Entry.JapaneseText: 兵隊？ 見てないよ？
Entry.EnglishText: Soldiers? I haven't seen any.

Entry.JapaneseText: ボク、かくれんぼ大好き!!
Entry.EnglishText: I like playing hide-and-seek!

Entry.JapaneseText: 広場？ お菓子でも配ってるの？ だったら、ボクも行く!!
Entry.EnglishText: The town square? Is someone giving out candy? I wanna go get some!

Entry.JapaneseText: 女王様の儀式って、 おいしいお菓子がもらえる？ だったら、ボクも行く！
Entry.EnglishText: Is there going to be yummy candy at the Queen's ceremony? If so, then I wanna go!

Entry.JapaneseText: 母ちゃんは旅の人には 親切にしろって言ったけど、 ガジュマは別なんだ！
Entry.EnglishText: My mom told me to be nice to travellers, but I can't be kind to Gajuma!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>幻の島<White>？ そういうのは海で働いてる人に 聞けばいいんじゃない？
Entry.EnglishText: The <Blue>Island of Illusions<White>? Maybe try asking the seafarers about it.

Entry.JapaneseText: 母ちゃんは旅の人には 親切にしろって言ったけど、 ガジュマは別なんだ！
Entry.EnglishText: My mom told me to be nice to travellers, but I can't be kind to Gajuma!

Entry.JapaneseText: ボク、ガジュマなんて 大ッキライなんだ！
Entry.EnglishText: I really really hate Gajuma!

Entry.JapaneseText: お菓子も取り上げられたし、 ボクたちヒューマと見た目も 全然ちがうしさ！
Entry.EnglishText: They took away my candy and they look nothing like Huma!

Entry.JapaneseText: サニイタウンへ ようこそいらっしゃいました！
Entry.EnglishText: Welcome to Sunnytown!

Entry.JapaneseText: 旅の人には親切にしなさいって 母ちゃんが言ってた。 大事なシューニューゲンなんだってさ。
Entry.EnglishText: My mom told me to be nice to travelers because they're our source of "inn come".

Entry.JapaneseText: クレア……待ってろよ……
Entry.EnglishText: Claire... I'm coming for you...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No
